mapper.sql: ro.id, ro.name, ro.seq, ro.description, ro.is_default AS isDefault
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ro.id, ro.`name`, ro.seq, ro.description, ro.is_default AS isDefault, group_concat(re.id) resourceIds, group_concat(re.`name`) resourceNames FROM sys_role ro INNER JOIN sys_role_resource rore ON ro.id = rore.role_id INNER JOIN sys_resource re ON re.id = rore.resource_id WHERE ro.id = #{id}
